<head>
	<meta charset="UTF-8">
	<title></title>
	<style type="text/css">
		.Absolute-Center {
			margin: auto;
			position: absolute;
			left: 0;
			bottom: 0;
			right: 0;
		}
	</style>
</head>

<body>
	<div class="a" style="width: 100%; height: 100px; background:blue;position:relative;align:bottom;">
		<div class="Absolute-Center" style=" width: 50px; height: 50px; background: red;"></div>
	</div>
</body>
